alert.note: Alert for Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Coastal York; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Interior York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 25 at 3:07PM EST until February 26 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and western Maine. Portions of central, northern, and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...A snowband is moving southeast from the mountains and will bring heavy snowfall across eastern New Hampshire and the coastal plain of Maine into the evening commute. This will lead to snowfall rates around 1 inch per hour and extremely dangerous travel conditions. Plan on slippery road conditions due to snow covered roads.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
